content: using a single skein of vanna s choice yarn and a minimal amount of green & brown you can whip up a cute pumpkin beanie for your favorite little pumpkin in no time at all the pattern also works well as a regular beanie for all around use by following the simple instructions to leave off the stem and vine if you have any questions please let me know so i can help you out you can message me here or send an email to comfycozywarm@yahoo ca if you make a beanie from my pattern please tag me on instagram @comfy cozy warm or post a pic to my facebook page www facebook com/comfycozywarm i would love to see your creations patterns are the sole property of comfy/cozy/warm lauralee wellman and may not transferred redistributed or resold in any way shape or form you can sell items you make using my pattern in small quantities but i do require that you reference me as the designer comfy/cozy/warm by lauralee wellman
